ee:variables.ee:set-variable:
%dw 2.0 output application/java
import generateJWT from dw::token
var iss = vars.emailAddress var sub = vars.userName
var accessTokenDuration = Mule::p("jwt.accessToken.duration") as Number var accessTokenType = Mule::p("jwt.accessToken.type") var refreshTokenDuration = Mule::p("jwt.refreshToken.duration") as Number var refreshTokenType = Mule::p("jwt.refreshToken.type") --- { accessToken: generateJWT(iss, sub, accessTokenType, accessTokenDuration), refreshToken: generateJWT(iss, sub, refreshTokenType, refreshTokenDuration) }
